post:
Hello Let People 

We running a promo of 50% off for any of our storage plan from our webpage https://hostsolutions.ro/eng/hosting/kvm-storage

Also if you are looking for a ssd plan we offer the same 50% off in any plan from here : https://hostsolutions.ro/eng/hosting/virtual-private-server-vps-ssd

To mention  : 

storage plan have raid 10 between 14 hdd/node
ssd plan have raid10 between 8 ssd/node.

All plans have 1gbps port speed and is located in Romania.

We offer 5 days money back guarantee in any of this orders.

Cupon code : **X6WAAI3VFX** recurring 12 times.


Exemple of storage plan : 

KVM VPS 256GB 
256 GB HDD
CPU 1vCore
1 Dedicated IP
256 MB ECC RAM
Full Root Access
Multiple 32/64 bit OS
2 TB Traffic/Month
1 Gbps Port
price 3.25 eur/quarently after applay the cupon code X6WAAI3VFX
